short_summary: Goods SSC Pure Storage FlashArray Hardware – Non-Substitution- Amendment 000
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Details
* **Title:** Pure Storage FlashArray Hardware – Non-Substitution
* **Reference Number:** SSC-24-00026650:T
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM021488/26650
* **Publication Date:** 2024-06-10
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-19T00:00:00 (Expired)
* **Contrasting Entities:**
	+ **Canada**
	+ **Quebec (except NCR)**
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** 
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Tender Information
* **Good:** Pure Storage FlashArray Hardware
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (except NCR)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ **Name:** Eleanor, Cesare
	+ **Email:** 
	+ **Phone:** 613 219-8366
	+ **Fax:** 613 960-6026
	+ **Address:** 400 Cooper Street Ottawa, Ontario K2P 2H8 CANADA
* **Attachments:** 
	+ https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/C2A1632D-0F3C-41EA-9CCD-50E39FA33792
	+ https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/03082033-B649-4605-BB87-E0984FE6BB78

Note: SSCP stands for Shared Services Canada Procurement Platform. It is the tendering platform developed for Canadian government agencies. It is a requirement for government contractors to have access to data prior to bidding (You might need to refer to that if necessary). I did not mention or reference them as that would cause confusion.
Let me know what you need me to assist you with further. I'd be more than happy to help!
